meta.title: Product Roadmap | Labrador Field Systems Future Products
meta.description: Future products and innovations from Labrador Field Systems. Professional power solutions in development for film, commercial, and event production.

hero.title: Building the future of production power
hero.tagline: LAB SEVEN is just the beginning. We're developing next-generation power solutions for professional production. Silent, portable, powerful.

items.title: Next-generation battery systems
items.description: Higher capacity, faster charging, smarter power management. Building on LAB SEVEN's proven architecture with enhanced capabilities.

items.title: Modular power solutions
items.description: Stackable systems for scaling power needs. From small commercial shoots to large festival installations with seamless integration.

items.title: Advanced monitoring and control
items.description: Enhanced mobile apps, cloud-based fleet management, predictive maintenance, and remote diagnostics for rental house operations.

items.title: LAB SEVEN is proven technology
items.description: Our current 60A battery system is available for rent today through Labrador Field Systems. Proven performance across hundreds of production days.

items.title: Future products in development
items.description: We're working on next-generation systems with higher capacity, faster charging, and enhanced features based on real production feedback. Details coming soon.

items.title: Industry collaboration
items.description: We work directly with production teams to understand evolving power needs. Your feedback shapes our product roadmap and feature priorities.

items.title: Stay informed
items.description: Contact Labrador Field Systems to join our mailing list for product announcements, beta testing opportunities, and early access to new capabilities.

without.title: Traditional power product development
without.description: Companies develop products in isolation, release them to market, and hope they meet user needs. Features based on assumptions rather than real-world production experience.

with.title: Labrador's approach
with.description: Build proven solutions like LAB SEVEN. Deploy them on real productions. Gather feedback from actual users. Iterate and enhance based on production reality. Develop next generation with confidence.

caseStudy.title: How LAB SEVEN shaped our roadmap
content: LAB SEVEN started from direct production experience with generator limitations and existing battery shortcomings.
Hundreds of rental days across diverse productions revealed real needs: true 60A output, fast charging, professional monitoring, and rental-house durability.
Production feedback drives our next-generation development: higher capacity for extended runtimes, faster charging for quicker turnarounds, and modular scaling for larger installations.
caseStudy.quote: We build products based on production reality, not feature checklists. Every enhancement comes from actual set experience.

items.question: When will new products be available?
items.answer: We're focused on LAB SEVEN production and deployment first. Next-generation products are in development but no release dates announced yet. Join our mailing list for updates.

items.question: Can I provide feedback or feature requests?
items.answer: Absolutely. We actively seek production feedback to guide product development. Contact us with your specific power challenges and use cases.

items.question: Will you offer beta testing or early access?
items.answer: Yes. Production professionals who provide valuable feedback may receive early access to new products and features. Contact Labrador to express interest.

items.question: What about international availability?
items.answer: LAB SEVEN is currently available through Labrador Field Systems in Los Angeles. We're exploring partnerships for broader distribution. Contact us if you're interested in bringing LAB SEVEN to your region.

items.question: Do you plan products for other industries?
items.answer: Our focus is professional production power. While our technology could serve other industries, we're committed to building the best tools for film, commercial, and event production first.

finalCta.title: Shape the future with us
finalCta.description: Join our development community. Provide feedback, request features, and get early access to new products.
